backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping proposal features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short descriptions of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app for Suvo’s proposal to Ahana.
frontend/src/components/ConfettiBurst.ts: Generates temporary animated confetti respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/components/CuteParticles.ts: Floating heart and sparkle particle effect with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/SimpleProposalMo: Two‑step proposal interaction with celebration state and confetti.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes, fonts, and utility animations like floating particles and gentle float.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AhanaProposalPage.tsx: Renders a multi-section romantic proposal page with themed gradients, photos, particles, and a SimpleProposalMoment component.
frontend/src/pages/AhanaValentinePage.ts: Empty placeholder page file for a Valentine-themed view.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom OKLCH color tokens, container settings, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Captures project metadata, requirements, design notes, and feature tracking for building a personalized Valentine proposal site.
